title: Coveted
description: Darkness breeds chaos, among other things, and as Draven and Aliyah continue to battle their inner depravity filled desires, the line between dark and light becomes distorted, testing, pulling and gnawing at their restraints.But it's not only them that's landed themselves in the crossfire of the Dark Goddess and her nefarious plans. Neferity has waited a long time for the revelation to come to fruition, and she'll stop at nothing until it's fulfilled.The darkness is circling, anticipating it's next feast, and if Draven and Aliyah aren't careful, they'll find themselves hanging themselves with the little rope they have left. Will they continue to curb their urges, or will they fall victim to the debauchery within.
author: Lena  Moore
